jervis.tools
[Groovy] Class securityIO

java.lang.Object
  jervis.tools.securityIO

class securityIO
extends Object

A class to provide cryptographic features to Jervis such as RSA encryption and base64 encoding.

Sample usage

import jervis.tools.securityIO
def security = new securityIO("/tmp",2048)
security.generate_rsa_pair()
println "Private key path: " + security.id_rsa_priv
println "Public key path: " + security.id_rsa_pub
println "Key size: " + security.id_rsa_keysize.toString()
def s = security.rsaEncrypt("hello friend")
println "Length of encrypted output: " + s.length()
println "Encrypted string:"
println s
println "Decrypted string:"
println security.rsaDecrypt(s)

Instantiates default values for id_rsa_priv and id_rsa_pub but id_rsa_keysize is set using keysize.

Instantiates setting custom values for id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, and id_rsa_keysize.

Field Detail

default_key_size

public static int default_key_size
The default key size for id_rsa_keysize. Default: 1024

id_rsa_keysize

public int id_rsa_keysize
The key size in which RSA keys will be generated. It is highly recommended this be 1024 bits or higher in powers of two. Default: value of default_key_size.

id_rsa_priv

public String id_rsa_priv
Path to the RSA private key. This will be used by encryptiong and decryption. During key generation it is the location where the private key will be written. Default: scmGit.getRoot + "/id_rsa.pem"

id_rsa_pub

public String id_rsa_pub
Path to the RSA public key. This will be used by encryptiong and decryption. During key generation it is the location where the public key will be written. Default: scmGit.getRoot + "/id_rsa.pub.pem"

 
Constructor Detail

securityIO

securityIO()
Instantiates default values for id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, and id_rsa_keysize.

securityIO

securityIO(int keysize)
Instantiates default values for id_rsa_priv and id_rsa_pub but id_rsa_keysize is set using keysize.

securityIO

securityIO(String path)
Instantiates the default value for id_rsa_keysize but sets id_rsa_priv and id_rsa_pub based on path. path sets the directory where the public and private key will be generated. Specifically values are set in the following manner: 

id_rsa_priv = checkPath()(path) + '/id_rsa.pem'
id_rsa_pub = checkPath(path) + '/id_rsa.pub.pem'
id_rsa_keysize = default_key_size

securityIO

securityIO(String path, int keysize)
Instantiates setting custom values for id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, and id_rsa_keysize. path sets the directory where the public and private key will be generated. keysize sets the value for id_rsa_keysize. Specifically values are set in the following manner: 

id_rsa_priv = checkPath()(path) + '/id_rsa.pem'
id_rsa_pub = checkPath(path) + '/id_rsa.pub.pem'
id_rsa_keysize = keysize

securityIO

securityIO(String priv_key_file_path, String pub_key_file_path, int keysize)
Instantiates setting custom values for id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, and id_rsa_keysize. Specifically values are set in the following manner: 

id_rsa_priv = priv_key_file_path
id_rsa_pub = pub_key_file_path
id_rsa_keysize = keysize

 
Method Detail

checkPath

String checkPath(String path)
Returns the right format for path. This is meant for properly setting the private and public key paths.
Parameters:
path - A full path or relative path on the filesystem. It must be a directory path.
Returns:
A path in the right format.
See Also:
securityIO(java.lang.String)

decodeBase64Bytes

byte[] decodeBase64Bytes(String content)
Decode a base64 String into Bytes.
Parameters:
content - Base64 encoded String.
Returns:
Decoded raw Bytes.

decodeBase64String

String decodeBase64String(String content)
Decode a base64 String.
Parameters:
content - Base64 encoded String.
Returns:
A decoded String.

encodeBase64

String encodeBase64(String content)
Encode a String into a base64 String.
Parameters:
content - A plain String.
Returns:
Base64 encoded String

encodeBase64

String encodeBase64(byte[] content)
Encode raw Bytes into a base64 String.
Parameters:
content - Base64 encoded String.
Returns:
Decoded raw Bytes.

generate_rsa_pair

void generate_rsa_pair(String priv_key_file_path, String pub_key_file_path, int keysize)
Generate an RSA key pair (private key and public key). It does not take values from id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, nor id_rsa_keysize.
Parameters:
priv_key_file_path - A file path where the private key will be written on the filesystem.
pub_key_file_path - A file path where the public key will be written on the filesystem.
keysize - The key size in bits of the key pair.

generate_rsa_pair

void generate_rsa_pair()
Generate an RSA key pair (private key and public key) using id_rsa_priv, id_rsa_pub, and id_rsa_keysize.

rsaDecrypt

String rsaDecrypt(String ciphertext)
Uses RSA asymetric encryption to decrypt a cipher text String and outputs plain text.
Parameters:
ciphertext - A Base64 encoded cipher text String to be decrypted.
Returns:
A plain text String or more generically: plaintext = RSAPrivateKeyDecrypt(base64decode(ciphertext))

rsaEncrypt

String rsaEncrypt(String plaintext)
Uses RSA asymetric encryption to encrypt a plain text String and outputs cipher text.
Parameters:
plaintext - A plain text String to be encrypted.
Returns:
A Base64 encoded cipher text or more generically: ciphertext = base64encode(RSAPublicKeyEncrypt(plaintext))
